com.aru

Class CloutCommandParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aru.CloutCommandParser

  • public class CloutCommandParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by avenkat The class parses a given line of input, then extracts valid commands form the line and processes them. It uses DBUtils to interact with the database to perform "clout" and "follows" commands by reading from and writing to the database.

      • performCloutCommand

        private void performCloutCommand(java.lang.String input)
        Performs a clout command with or without specific subject. If there is no subject following the clout command, it will find the clout for every subject in the database. If subject specified then finds that subjects clout,
        Parameters:
        input - clout command, either with a subject specified, or without.

      • performFollowsCommand

        private void performFollowsCommand(java.lang.String input)
        Performs the follows command by extracting subject and follower and then writing the relationship to database
        Parameters:
        input - Input line containing the follows command and subject and follower
